function.name: search_advice
function.description: Returns advice that matches a given search string

query.description: The search string must be a single word. Generalize user queries to a single, simple word. For example, if the user asks for advice on how to cope with a difficult situation at work, you use the query `work`.

function.name: advice_by_id
function.description: Returns the advice for the given id

slid_id.description: The unique id for the advice
